title: Ep 25 | Jase Tells How to Have the Greatest Sex, Phil’s Football Legacy, and Al’s Airport Adventures
description:
Jase explains why sex in marriage is the best sex, Phil looks back on his glory days at Louisiana Tech, and Al talks about his encounters at the airport. 

 

See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX

See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1
